name: The Snail
description:
The Snail - A Game Boy Style Rogue-lite with randomly generated levels!

You are an adventurer searching for treasure in a deep cave, but your greed will not go unpunished. As you try to escape with your treasure you will have to avoid traps, find keys to ascend, and avoid the mysterious snail! Can you make it out alive in this Game Boy styled rogue lite?

This game features:

-High Score System

-Randomly Generated Levels

-Multiple Endings

-Trophies to Collect

-Original art and music

I am a solo game dev making  Game Boy styled games as a hobby. This game was made in GB Studio by Chris Maltby. The game is a rogue lite with randomly generated levels. This was a project I made to test how random generation could work in GB Studio. I hope to make a DX version in the future with colour, more game mechanics, and updates/fixes if required.

Controls for browser:

A = Z

B = X

D-PAD = Arrow Keys

START = ENTER

SELECT = SHIFT

Thank you for playing the game! This is my first game I have released. I hope you enjoy it, and I would appreciate any comments or feedback!
